doc:
Shorty Rossi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shorty_Rossi 0 Luigi "Shorty" Rossi (born February 10, 1969) is the star of Pit Boss, a reality series (now cancelled) on Animal Planet. He is also the owner and talent manager of Shortywood Productions, a company that works with little people in the entertainment industry and Shorty's Rescue, an organization set up for Pit Bull rescue (which is no longer in service). Luigi_"_Shorty_"_Rossi ( born February_10_,_1969 ) is the_star of Pit_Boss , a_reality_series ( now cancelled ) on Animal_Planet . He is also the_owner_and_talent_manager of Shortywood_Productions , a_company that works with little_people in the_entertainment_industry and Shorty 's_Rescue , an_organization set up for_Pit_Bull_rescue ( which is no_longer in service_) .
